alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 8:08PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Carbon and southwestern Albany Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 808 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Hog Park Campground to 8 miles southeast of Woods Landing. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Encampment, Grand Encampment, Six Mile Campground, Brooklyn Lake Campground, Woods Landing-Jelm, Nash Fork Campground, Ryan Park Campground, Boswell Creek Campground, Rob Roy Reservoir, Lake Owen, Bobbie Thompson Campground, Arlington, Hog Park Reservoir, French Creek Campground, Skyline, Ryan Park, Brooklyn Lake, Sugar Loaf Campground and Libby Creek Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 266 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin
